Name: Tarim: Guardians
About the game: Somewhere, in some town that may be unknown to all; there was Tarim, a sad but strong hermitthat without knowing it or be waiting for it would be forced by itself to enter on a great adventure to save to the town of his childhood, a town without stains and that never had known the fear. Tarim is a adventure of action and rol with a campaign about a hero, Tarim and the story about how he saved his people and the sacrifices he had to make it. Key features: 2 Great characters to play with Leveling Up to be stronger Levels set and carefully developed to achieve a desired gaming experience. Fight with unique bosses. Lots of enemies all of them with different features. 2 Big chapters available to play. Tons of unlockable items.
